course_description: Prerequisite: Japanese 201 or consent of instructor. Provides an in-depth knowledge of the Japanese language in relation to culture and society, focusing on Japanese modes of thinking that lie behind language usage. Taught in English.
sections: Class Nbr: 2001, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: M. Mazzotta, Status: Open
